title: MOVING WARDS GLITCH
body:
Useful ward moving trick in the Jungle

Ex. Chicken brush, between red buff + baron brush, between red buff + dragon brush

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yos0h6_wL5c

replies.body: I didn't know what to put in the description

Hey dude, I think you have a lot of potential and are really funny. My big problem though with your previous videos (like the first) is that they are in really low res. If you could up the quality like what you did with this one, I think it’ll make it easier for those who do watch. You’ve earned yourself a sub!

> [{quoted}](name=CloudChaser24,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LPEMH0eH,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-11-27T05:50:30.797+0000)
>
> Hey dude, I think you have a lot of potential and are really funny. My big problem though with your previous videos (like the first) is that they are in really low res. If you could up the quality like what you did with this one, I think it’ll make it easier for those who do watch. You’ve earned yourself a sub!

Thank you so much man, it means alot!

Yeah, I'm new to record/editing, and my computer's not the greatest, but I promise to get better!

If you liked this one, wait till my 4th video comes out ;)
It's auto scheduled to post tomorrow @7am and by far is it one of my favorite one's :D
y u only talk in all chat

I'm not sitting through a 10-minute ad to be allowed to watch this (the 'Skip this ad.' button is not appearing).

Which is sad, because I REALLY wanted to know. I guess I don't want it badly enough.  =P
Welcome to 2015...or 2014 or 2013 etc where adblock exists.

I already run AdBlock. I have NOTHING white-listed.

I don't see ads like banners and the like but videos are still a curse.
Weird...I never get the ads on youtuve videos.
Adblock has been around for about 15 years or so.

Ummm they made it that way so you can't place a ward directly under the monster like pple used to do with Dragon. It used to be if you placed a ward directly underneath dragon noone could clear it w/out drawing aggro from the dragon which was bad. So now whenever you place a ward underneath a large monster it will bounce away. Im just assuming thats whats happening here.
I noticed this when I was doing blue buff yesterday. Nobody on my team believed me. :(

> [{quoted}](name=LulluLea,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LPEMH0eH,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-11-27T02:37:52.447+0000)
>
> I noticed this when I was doing blue buff yesterday. Nobody on my team believed me. :(

I feel for you :/
i saw that happen at red during a game, thought i was trippn x.x
My friends thought I was tripping when I broke into hysterical laughter when I saw the ward
